item.description:
(Sorry, this is kind of last minute.  Please RSVP so I can make a reservation.)

It's Mother's Day, but not all of us are lucky enough to be able to spend the day with our moms.  For various reasons we are orphans on this special day, and since the #1 lady in our lives is not available, let's spend dinner together.

And you are welcome to join us even if you got to see your mom today.  Heck! you can even bring her along if you'd like.

We'll meet at Trinity Brewhouse for a warm meal and a cold drink.  And we'll raise those drinks to the women who made us all possible.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the reservation under the name Stephanie.
item.why: Let's have dinner and miss our mommies together.
item.name: We miss our mommies!
